data.name: leftEditor.Text
data.value:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ This sample shows two different editors sharing the same document and keeping their views synchronized.
Things to try: - Vertical scrolling - Horizontal scrolling - Add splitter - Move splitter - Remove splitter ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
